    • Uses of Theme in util

      Methods in util that return types with arguments of type Theme 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ArrayList<Theme> ThemeFinderImpl.returnThemes()
      Walks the directory tree rooted at the root directory specified in Theme looking for .xml files representing Themes, deserialises and returns those it finds in an array of Themes Does not recurse further than root folders of themes i.e.: any lower than Theme\themefolder\*.xml is not considered valid
      ArrayList<Theme> ThemeFinder.returnThemes() 
      Methods in util with parameters of type Theme 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void XMLBuilderRunner.writeThemeXML(Theme theme)
      Serialises a theme and writes to disk at the root directory in a folder named after the theme
